Package DAO

Class appointmentsDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.appointmentsDAO
  • public class appointmentsDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the DAO class for querying appointments.

      • getAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointments()
        Query for getting all appointments from the database. Getting the customer name, username and contact name so that the names will display in the tables instead of the IDs.
        Returns:

      • totalCustAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> totalCustAppointments​(int monthSelection)
        Querying the database for the total customer appointments report. Setting just the type and total columns. Counting the total appointments where the month is equal to the selection. Grouping by type.
        Parameters:
        monthSelection -
        Returns:

      • contactAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> contactAppointments​(int contactSelection)
        Querying database for contact's appointments report. Getting the specified data from the columns based on the contactID matching the selection of a contact. Grouped by appointmentID for duplicates.
        Parameters:
        contactSelection -
        Returns:

      • pastAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> pastAppointments()
        Querying the database for additional report past appointments. Gets the values for all the specified columns where the start of the appointment is before now.
        Returns:
